name: Theseus Goes for a Ride
description:
GROUP33 AMA

Theseus Goes for a Ride

Description: Your favorite Greek mythology is back with a modern twist! Theseus returns to slay the out of control minotaur population, but instead of a sword he's using a race car. Unfortunately, the minotaur has enlisted gorillas to help him, but Theseus loves gorillas and can't bear to harm a single one. Plus they're endangered species, and even a Greek god is not above the law. Your objective as Theseus is to crush the minotaur while avoiding all gorillas. If Theseus hits a gorilla, the grief overwhelms him and he vanishes to another realm.

Instructions: Run over minotaurs, avoid gorillas.

Controls: Use arrow keys to steer <- left, ^ forward, v backward, -> right

The following Unity Assets were used in the project:

- Standard Assets Environment, Vehicles, Characters, Utility

- Nature Starter Kit 2

- Gorilla

- Minotaur

- SkyB1
